email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate for this route. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $48.75 sounds reasonable, but we’d like to lock in the laycan as October 15-20 without any delays. Can you confirm the vessel’s availability and provide a draft contract for review? Also, could you clarify the laytime terms? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and the laycan of October 15-20 is firm. The laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. I’ll send over the draft contract shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’re good to proceed at $48.75 per metric ton. Please send the draft contract, and we’ll review it today. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the draft contract for your review. Let me know if there are any adjustments needed. Once confirmed, we can proceed to finalize the agreement. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
